ComicInfo.Summary:
Social media has crept its way into almost every aspect of our daily lives. Some say it's a blessing, others believe it's the beginning of the end of civilization. Who really controls the news feeds or broadcast messages you hear? What is the truth? Can anyone be trusted? Find out in this pulse-pounding issue!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Leonardo Colapietro | 1 | B | Cover B | Sheldon Goh & Vinicius Andrade | 2 |
